content.question: Abbasid reliance on Persian bureaucrats and the introduction of Confucianism to Japanese political institutions both illustrate which of the following processes?

choices.label: The integration of conquered peoples into existing social and political structures
The synthesis of foreign political traditions in the formation of new states
The influence of complex semireligious philosophies
The diffusion of cultural ideals as trading networks grew in complexity

content.answer: The synthesis of foreign political traditions in the formation of new states

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
